Field Summary
static int CTRL_TYPE_BUTTON
          If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_BUTTON, its value is always 0, and pressing it is done by setting any value using Control.setValue(int).
static int CTRL_TYPE_DISCRETE
          If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_DISCRETE, it only accepts a set of values (discrete values).
static int CTRL_TYPE_SLIDER
          If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_SLIDER, it accepts a range of values between a minimum (as returned by Control.getMinValue()) and a maximum (as returned by Control.getMaxValue()) in increments (as returned by Control.getStepValue())
static int CTRL_TYPE_SWITCH
          If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_SWITCH, it accepts two different values: 0 (as returned by Control.getMinValue()) and 1 (as returned by Control.getMaxValue().

CTRL_TYPE_BUTTON

public static final int CTRL_TYPE_BUTTON
If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_BUTTON, its value is always 0, and pressing it is done by setting any value using Control.setValue(int).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CTRL_TYPE_SLIDER

public static final int CTRL_TYPE_SLIDER
If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_SLIDER, it accepts a range of values between a minimum (as returned by Control.getMinValue()) and a maximum (as returned by Control.getMaxValue()) in increments (as returned by Control.getStepValue())

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CTRL_TYPE_SWITCH

public static final int CTRL_TYPE_SWITCH
If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_SWITCH, it accepts two different values: 0 (as returned by Control.getMinValue()) and 1 (as returned by Control.getMaxValue().

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CTRL_TYPE_DISCRETE

public static final int CTRL_TYPE_DISCRETE
If a control has a type equal to CTRL_TYPE_DISCRETE, it only accepts a set of values (discrete values). This set of acceptable values is returned by Control.getDiscreteValues(). These discrete values may have string descriptions (returned by Control.getDiscreteValueNames()) and are in the range Control.getMinValue() and Control.getMaxValue(). The step value as returned by Control.getStepValue() is not applicable.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TUNER_TYPE_RADIO

public static final int TUNER_TYPE_RADIO
A tuner with a type (as returned by TunerInfo.getType()) equal to TUNER_TYPE_RADIO is a radio tuner

See Also:
